accessibility.label: Currently, there are no accessible berths in our harbors.

agreed.label: I have read the terms and conditions of the contract and agree to abide by them.

inspected.label: I confirm that the vessel has been inspected.

insurance.label: I confirm that the vessel is insured, and that the insurance covers any costs arising from hoisting the vessel.

text.inspection_and_insurance: The inspection certificate and an extract from the insurance policy must be provided prior to berth assignment. The inspection and insurance must remain valid with no interruptions. The lessor has the right to demand that the inspection certificate and the extract from the insurance policy are presented at any time.
text.summary: Vessels weighing more than 20,000 kg are moored in designated berths. Berths for larger vessels are reserved either on a fixed-term basis or until further notice.

header.title: Information on the boat to be purchased

application_code.description: If you have received a search code from customer services, please enter it here. Search codes are intended for customers who have already applied for a boat berth via a paper application form.
application_code.title: Search code

guarantee.label: I confirm that the information I have provided is correct.

storage_type.text: If stored on a trailer, one metre is added to the length of the boat.

storage_method.on_trailer: I will be storing the boat on a trailer
storage_method.on_trestles: I will be storing the boat on trestles

field.label: Trailer’s register number
field.text: Only registered trailers are allowed on winter storage areas. If the trailer’s registration number is not yet known, report the registration number before bringing the boat in for winter storage. Storing on a trailer requires 1m extra storage space length.

button.invalid: Please complete the form to continue

paragraph.first: This service allows for you to browse through the boat harbours in Helsinki and submit new applications to the harbours of your choice.
paragraph.second: NOTE! Please read the instructions on selecting harbours as well as further details concerning the principles of assigning berths and the processing times for applications on the <1>hel.fi</1> website before completing your application.

berth.title: Applying for a berth in the boat harbours of the City of Helsinki

paragraph.first: Here you can apply for a winter storage space for your boat in the City of Helsinki’s storage locations. Appointed spaces become available only rarely, so please also include locations with no designated spaces in your application.
paragraph.second: NOTE! Please read the instructions on selecting storage areas as well as further details concerning the principles of assigning storage spaces and the processing times for applications on the <1>hel.fi</1> website before completing your application. <3/> If you are interested in storing your boat in the water at your designated boat berth over the winter, please contact us.

berth.legend: Browse the harbours and berths offered by the City. Choose up to ten suitable harbours for your application.
berth.title: What type of berth are you looking for?

boat.legend: Boat berths are applied for boat-specifically. Please enter the boat information for the boat you are intending to keep in the berth here. You may also apply for a berth even if you do not have a boat as of yet.
boat.title: Boat information

overview.legend: Please check the accuracy of the information once more before submitting your application.
overview.title: Summary

person.legend: Berths can be applied for by private individuals, organisations and companies. Companies are charged an increased annual rent.
person.title: Applicant information

selected_areas.legend: Review the winter storage areas you have chosen and their suitability for your boat. Order the areas you have chosen by preference.
selected_areas.title: Your selection

selected_berths.legend: Review the harbours you have chosen and their suitability for your boat. Order the harbours you have chosen by preference.
selected_berths.title: Your selection

winter.legend: Please enter the dimensions of the boat to be stored. You can see the locations with spaces suitable for the size of your boat in the location list. You can also sort the list based on the services available at the location.
winter.title: Browse and search for winter storage locations

message.paragraph1: You will shortly receive a confirmation message to the e-mail address you provided on your application. If you wish to change or cancel your application or ask any questions regarding your application, please e-mail venepaikkavaraukset@hel.fi.
message.paragraph2:
Helsingin kaupungin venepaikkavaraukset (Berth reservations of the City of Helsinki)
venepaikkavaraukset.hel.fi
Advice over the telephone is available 9–12 Monday–Thursday by calling 09 310 87900.

application_sent.title: Thank you, your application has been sent successfully!

current_berth.info_text: Please provide the details of your current berth for the exchange application.

reason.info_text: You can select a special request concerning the type of the new berth from the list. Please note, however, that if you select a special request, you will only be offered a berth when a berth meeting your request becomes available.
reason.title: Special request for a new berth

exchange_application.warning: You can select up to five harbours for your exchange application. Please remove excess selections and change the application type again.

berths.description: Browse the City of Helsinki’s boat harbours. You can submit a new boat berth application or apply to exchange your current boat berth for another one.
berths.title: Boat berth search

for winter storage spaces
winter.description: Browse the City of Helsinki’s winter storage spaces for boats. You can submit a new application for a winter storage space for your boat.
winter.title: Winter storage places

description.body: Browse the City of Helsinki’s boat harbours. You can submit a new boat berth application or apply to exchange your current boat berth for another one.
description.heading: Boat berths and the winter storage of boats

not_found.message: We are sorry, but the page you requested could not be found.

already_paid.message: The payment you attempted to make has already been marked as received. Thank you!
already_paid.title: The payment has already been made

general_error.message: We are sorry, but the payment could not be found. It may have been cancelled or the link may be invalid.
general_error.title: Failure

past_due_date.message: We are sorry, but the payment can no longer be made because its due date has passed. Boat berth payments cannot be made past the due date.
past_due_date.title: The due date has passed

message.paragraph1: Dear customer, we have received your payment. We will send you a receipt by e-mail.

payment_failed.title: Failure
payment_failed.paragraph1: We are sorry, but an error occurred when processing the payment.
payment_failed.paragraph2: You can try making your payment later. If necessary, please contact our customer service.

payment.title: Paying the invoice
payment.terms_info: Dear customer, we have updated the agreement terms for winter storage spaces. Please read the agreement terms below. You can continue to making your payment after that. Reserving a winter storage space requires that you accept the agreement terms.
payment.accept_terms: I have read and accept the winter storage space agreement terms

list.areas_count: {{count}} winter storage matches the search criteria
list.areas_count_plural: {{count}} winter storage match the search criteria

progress.remaining: You can still select {{count}} winter storage area for your application
progress.remaining_plural: You can still select {{count}} winter storage areas for your application
progress.max: Maximum number of ({{total}}) winter storage areas selected
progress.zero: Choose a maximum of {{total}} winter storage areas for your application

notice.paragraph1: Applying for winter storage spaces in the 2020–2021 season is now current. Customers who have had a square space in the last season will be sent an invoice for the space. If you are a new applicant, you can apply for a square space by filling out the online application at <1>venepaikat.hel.fi/en</1>. Available squares will be assigned on a first-come, first-served basis in the autumn. We will send offers for these spaces by e-mail.
notice.paragraph2: Customers who have had a winter storage space in a hoisting order area will not be sent an invoice. Instead, they can pay their fee onto the berth reservation account after the boat has been brought to the hoisting order area. We will provide information about paying for hoisting order area spaces later online at <1>hel.fi/boating</1> and on the information boards of hoisting order areas. Customers who have paid for a winter storage space will be sent a winter storage sticker to be attached to their boats on a visible spot.
notice.paragraph3: Boaters can bring their boats to the hoisting order area of their choosing starting from 15 September 2020. Please note that boats must not be brought to hoisting order areas before the storage season starts on 15 September.
notice.title: Applying for winter storage spaces 2020–2021
